label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added a retry mechanism in Route53 for failed batch changes, with failed changes queued and resubmitted in batches to ensure consistency.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug to ensure PiHole entries are only updated when they have actually changed.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for relabelings and metricRelabelings in the Helm chart's serviceMonitor.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added AWS VPC endpoint canonical hosted zone IDs.

label: kind/feature
impact/high
notes.text: Added Osaka (ap-northeast-3) Hosted Zone ID for AWS Network Load Balancers.
